title: Hour 1 - The Sports Trust
itunes:title: Hour 1 - The Sports Trust
description:
Covino & Rich fill in for Dan Patrick and start the laughter early with random Willie Randolph stats and talk people who don't like coffee. Besides not trusting people who have never drank coffee before.. who do you NOT trust? From the guy wearing multiple teams from different cities to the woman who blamed her Astrology sign for bad behavior. Caller from around the country weigh-in! #FSRWeekends

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
